ActEmergency Preparedness Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCIES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 67 - which (a) DECLARES that the severe flooding in British Columbia between October 16 and 23, 2003 to be of concern to the federal government, and (b) AUTHORIZES the provision of financial assistance in that regard.
